attributes.action: Make childcare lessons compulsory on School Curricullum
attributes.additional_details: The most inportant thing in our society is the ability to adequately raise children & in the extremely complex & challenging world of today, help is required.  There is an unwritten law stating that child rearing comes naturally but that is only survival teaching.  There is much more to existing in our society today that needs to be taught.  Please join us in making this point.
